Rafael Soares

São Paulo · Brazil · +55(11)94455-2187

I'm Software Developer, and also have knowledge of using Node/Angular/Typescript/JavaScript in addition to HTML/CSS/PHP/SQL. I've been working with software development since 2019, using agile methodology and TDD since November/2019.

Currently a AdvPL developer (TOTVS Language) in the Healthcare segment. I already worked Development in websites using the following softwares: HTML, CSS, PHP, Bootstrap and Adobe XD. SEO allowing ranking websites and using Linux - Ubuntu. Management of the Control Panel (WordPress), focusing Custom Fields and Custom Post Types as mainly development.

Looking for new challenges, I am always in contact with new technologies in order to consolidate and expand my knowledge.

Sou Desenvolvedor de Software e também possuo conhecimento de frontend usando Node/Angular/Typescript/JavaScript em adição ao HTML/CSS/PHP/SQL. Trabalho com desenvolvimento de software desde 2019 usando metodologia ágil e TDD desde Novembro/2019.

Atualmente sou Desenvolvedor AdvPL (Linguagem TOTVS) no segmento Healthcare, já atuei com Desenvolvimento em WebSites usando as seguintes tecnologias: HTML, CSS, PHP, Bootstrap, Adobe XD, SEO Search Engine Optimization, Linux, Ubuntu. Gerenciamento de Painel de Controle (WordPress), focando em campos customizados e tipos de posts customizados.

Em busca de novos desafios, estou sempre em contato com novas tecnologias a fim de consolidar e ampliar meu conhecimento
